title: Keycloak 22.0.4 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Improve feature (detection) code in the Admin Console keycloak admin/api  * Remove bearer-only content from the Server Administration Guide keycloak docs  * Move email validation change docs to migration guide of 22.0.3 keycloak docs  * Move email validation change docs to migration guide of 22.0.4 keycloak docs  * Improve documentation about manual database migration keycloak docs  * Deploy JavaScript adapter to Maven repository keycloak   BUGS   * user first name not refreshed in Keycloak V2 theme keycloak account/ui  * Using truststore with LDAP and StartTLS is not working keycloak ldap  * Can't boot Keycloak server with Java KeyStore p12 file running on Windows    10/2019 keycloak dist/quarkus  * Custom User Provider SPI: MULTIVALUED_STRING_TYPE value isn't correctly    displayed on ui (but correctly saved and retrieved) keycloak admin/ui  * Deep link format for redirect uri parameter is not parsed correctly keycloak    core  * Keycloak 22.0.1 unable to create user with long email address keycloak    admin/api  * Linux Firefox + Keycloak 22.0.1 issue(continuation of issue 21307) keycloak    authentication  * Not-working link during adding a SAML Identity provider keycloak admin/ui  * Events filter by IP Address not working keycloak admin/api  * NullpointerException when using encrypted SAML assertions keycloak saml  * KC22: Issue with FIPS140 in non approved mode. keycloak core  * Admin console throwing 403 error when logged in for sub realm using local    admin user keycloak admin/ui  * TypeError in user profile admin-ui keycloak admin/ui  * Registration page not showing username when edit username is not enabled    keycloak user-profile  * SAML Encryption Key Export Downloads Signing Key keycloak admin/ui  * Race condition inside Keycloak build chain execution keycloak dist/quarkus  * NPE in AuthenticationManager backchannelLogout keycloak core  * PolicyEnforcer should set WWW-Authenticate header before calling sendError()    method keycloak authorization-services  * User cannot be created via Admin UI if custom user attribute is required    keycloak admin/ui  * Keycloak 22.0.3: Create user: select groups to join filter does nothing    keycloak admin/ui  * Test failures with Wildfly/EAP adapters using TLS keycloak ci  * Reopening of CVE-2023-21971 - Update Connector/J to 8.0.33 keycloak    dependencies  * Outdated kcadm.sh help examples can be misleading to our users keycloak    admin/cli  * Cannot update email address when "Email as username" is enabled keycloak    admin/api  * Allow 'prompt' Value 'consent' in Keycloak JavaScript Adapter keycloak    adapter/javascript  * Text field for last name field in user form has an incorrect ID keycloak    admin/ui  * Some container implementations don't work with the documented additional RPM    install procedure keycloak docs  * Upload JVM Heapdumps action fail on Windows keycloak ci  * 22.0.4 Operator installed via OLM deploys Keycloak nightly version keycloak    operator
